original_text: Meanwhile, the people were waiting for Zechariah and wondering why he stayed so long in the temple.
korean_text: 백성들이 사가랴를 기다리며 그가 성전 안에서 지체함을 이상히 여기더라

sentences.original_text: the people were waiting for Zechariah
why he stayed so long in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성전에 그렇게 오래 머무는 이유를
